game.name: Hyposphere Z
game.shortDescription: Hyposphere Z is a retro cyberpunk 3D puzzle platformer where you control a sphere, collect coins, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles by jumping or dodging them.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hyposphere Z is a retro cyberpunk 3D puzzle platformer where you control a sphere, collect coins, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles by jumping or dodging them.

reviewHighlights.text: (this is my first reviev ever..!) I just finished the game, it had it tricky parts but overall it was a bit easy and short, like the game said in the...
Impossible to control, plays like ass, low effort shovelware. Wish I had read Obey the Fist's review before I purchased.
